ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I will roast him in Saqar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I will cast him into the fire of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Him shall I soon roast in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I shall make him suffer the torment of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: I will soon fling him into hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: I will cast him into Saqar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I will cast him into hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I shall surely roast him in Sakar;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Him shall I fling unto the burning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Soon I will cast him into hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Anon shall I roast him into the Scorching Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Soon I will cast him into Saqar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Soon will I cast him into Hell-Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I will cast him into Hell-fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I will surely roast him in the Scorching.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I will roast him in Saqar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I will drive him into Saqar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:26] I shall [soon] admit him into Saqar! — Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Him) al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah (shall I fling) in the Hereafter (unto the burning) unto the fourth gate of the Fire.
